verses.text: When \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w* these \w words|strong="G5023"\w*, he went \w forth|strong="G1831"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w over|strong="G4008"\w* the \w brook|strong="G5493"\w* \w Cedron|strong="G2748"\w*, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w garden|strong="G2779"\w*, \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w betrayed|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* the \w place|strong="G5117"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w ofttimes|strong="G4178"\w* \w resorted|strong="G4863"\w* \w thither|strong="G1563"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

\w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, having \w received|strong="G2983"\w* a \w band|strong="G4686"\w* \add of men\add* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w officers|strong="G5257"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w thither|strong="G1563"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w lanterns|strong="G5322"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w torches|strong="G2985"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w weapons|strong="G3696"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* should \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, went \w forth|strong="G1831"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Whom|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w seek ye|strong="G2212"\+w*?\wj*

They \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w*. \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+add he\+add*.\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w betrayed|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

As \w soon|strong="G5613"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* as he had \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \add he\add*, they \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w backward|strong="G3694"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* to the \w ground|strong="G5476"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* asked \w he|strong="G1905"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \wj  \+w Whom|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w seek ye|strong="G2212"\+w*?\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \wj  \+w I have told|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+add he\+add*: \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w ye seek|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*, \+w let|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w these|strong="G5128"\+w* \+w go their way|strong="G5217"\+w*:\wj*

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* the \w saying|strong="G3056"\w* might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w gavest|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* have I \w lost|strong="G0622"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* a \w sword|strong="G3162"\w* \w drew|strong="G1670"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w smote|strong="G3817"\w* the high \w priest’s|strong="G0749"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* cut \w off|strong="G0609"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w ear|strong="G5621"\w*. The \w servant’s|strong="G1401"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w Malchus|strong="G3124"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* unto \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \wj  \+w Put up|strong="G0906"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w sword|strong="G3162"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the sheath|strong="G2336"\+w*: \+w the cup|strong="G4221"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w hath given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*, \+w shall I|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w drink|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*?\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* the \w band|strong="G4686"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w officers|strong="G5257"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w took|strong="G4815"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w led|strong="G0520"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w away|strong="G0520"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Annas|strong="G0452"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* father in \w law|strong="G3995"\w* to \w Caiaphas|strong="G2533"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* that \w same|strong="G1565"\w* \w year|strong="G1763"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w Caiaphas|strong="G2533"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* he, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* gave \w counsel|strong="G4823"\w* to the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* it was expedient \w that|strong="G4851"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* should \w die|strong="G0622"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add so did\add* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w*: \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* unto the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* went in \w with|strong="G4897"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w palace|strong="G0833"\w* of the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* the \w door|strong="G2374"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w*. \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* unto the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spake|strong="G2036"\w* unto her that kept the \w door|strong="G2377"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* brought \w in|strong="G1521"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w damsel|strong="G3814"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* kept the \w door|strong="G2377"\w* unto \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w Art|strong="G1488"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add one\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w man’s|strong="G0444"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*? He \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w officers|strong="G5257"\w* stood \w there|strong="G2476"\w*, who had \w made|strong="G4160"\w* a fire of \w coals|strong="G0439"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w cold|strong="G5592"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they warmed \w themselves|strong="G2328"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* warmed \w himself|strong="G2328"\w*.

¶ The high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w asked|strong="G2065"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w spake|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w openly|strong="G3954"\+w* \+w to the world|strong="G2889"\+w*; \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w ever|strong="G3842"\+w* \+w taught|strong="G1321"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the synagogue|strong="G4864"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the temple|strong="G2411"\+w*, \+w whither|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w the Jews|strong="G2453"\+w* \+w always|strong="G3842"\+w* \+w resort|strong="G4905"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w secret|strong="G2927"\+w* \+w have I said|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3762"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w askest thou|strong="G1905"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*? \+w ask|strong="G1905"\+w* \+w them which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w heard me|strong="G0191"\+w*, \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w I have said|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w unto them|strong="G0846"\+w*: \+w behold|strong="G1492"\+w*, \+w they|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w what|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w said|strong="G2036"\+w*.\wj*

And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2036"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of the \w officers|strong="G5257"\w* which stood \w by|strong="G3936"\w* \w struck|strong="G1325"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* with the palm of his \w hand|strong="G4475"\w*, \w saying|strong="G2036"\w*, Answerest \w thou|strong="G0611"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w I have spoken|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G2560"\+w*, \+w bear witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w the evil|strong="G2556"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w well|strong="G2573"\+w*, \+w why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w smitest thou|strong="G1194"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*?\wj*

Now \w Annas|strong="G0452"\w* had \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Caiaphas|strong="G2533"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* warmed \w himself|strong="G2328"\w*. They \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Art|strong="G1488"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add one\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*? \w He|strong="G1565"\w* \w denied|strong="G0720"\w* \add it\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w One|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* of the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \add his\add* \w kinsman|strong="G4773"\w* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w ear|strong="G5621"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* cut \w off|strong="G0609"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Did|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w garden|strong="G2779"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w denied|strong="G0720"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* the \w cock|strong="G0220"\w* \w crew|strong="G5455"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* led \w they|strong="G0071"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Caiaphas|strong="G2533"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the hall of \w judgment|strong="G4232"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w early|strong="G4405"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G1525"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the judgment \w hall|strong="G4232"\w*, \w lest|strong="G2443"\w* they should be \w defiled|strong="G3392"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w*.

\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w accusation|strong="G2724"\w* bring \w ye|strong="G5342"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*?

They \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* a \w malefactor|strong="G2555"\w*, we \w would|strong="G3860"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* have \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* up unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Take|strong="G2983"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*. The \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* said \w unto|strong="G2036"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, It \w is|strong="G1832"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* lawful for \w us|strong="G2254"\w* to \w put|strong="G0615"\w* any \w man|strong="G3762"\w* to \w death|strong="G0615"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* the \w saying|strong="G3056"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2036"\w*, \w signifying|strong="G4591"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* he \w should|strong="G3195"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the judgment \w hall|strong="G4232"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G5455"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Art|strong="G1488"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* the \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Sayest|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w this thing|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w thyself|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w did others|strong="G0243"\+w* \+w tell it|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*?\wj*

\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w Am|strong="G1510"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* a \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*? Thine \w own|strong="G4674"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* have \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* unto \w me|strong="G1698"\w*: \w what|strong="G5101"\w* hast thou \w done|strong="G4160"\w*?
